Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang1
Text.Desc: Have only pure yang attainment, when controlling artifacts, can destroy everthing.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang2
Text.Desc: Have nearly pure yang attainment, improve artifact mastery ability from the basic.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang3
Text.Desc: Have imbalanced yang and yin attainment. This has a negative effect on mental state and protect a bad mental state and Qi protect.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang4
Text.Desc: Attainment is with a bit flaw but balanced. It can improve mental state along with Qi protect ability.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang5
Text.Desc: Gain a yang and yin attainment completely balanced state. Mental state is pure and Qi all around the body turns like Taiji.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang6
Text.Desc: Attainment is with a bit flaw but balanced. It can improve mental state along with Qi protect ability.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang7
Text.Desc: Have imbalanced yang and yin attainment. This has a negative effect on mental state and protect a bad mental state and Qi protect.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang8
Text.Desc: Have nearly pure yin attainment, improve spell ability from the basic.

Text.Name: Modifier_DLC_WuDang_YinYang9
Text.Desc: Have only pure yang attainment, when controlling spells, can master everthing.
